sentences.en: Holy God fulfills you with fruitfulness , prosperity , completeness and souvereign while you follow His words.
sentences.cn: 当你听从神的话语,神会让我们重生,并享受丰盛和富足.

sentences.en: It was an emblem of purity, fruitfulness ( because of its many seeds ) and creative power.
sentences.cn: 它是纯洁, 多子 ( 因为它结的许多种子 ) 和创造力的象征.

sentences.en: It would be as inappropriate as the farmer questioning the soil about its fruitfulness.
sentences.cn: 正如农民对土地质疑其丰饶一般极不妥当.

sentences.en: Teach God's people through these revelations the way of faithfulness and fruitfulness.
sentences.cn: 藉著这种种启示,教导上帝的子民如何向上帝忠心,为祂结果子.

sentences.en: The purpose that God created human is to make human a manager of fruitfulness and multiplication.
sentences.cn: 神创造人的目的是要他成为多产与倍增的管理者.

sentences.en: Throughout the ages people have considered citrus fruit to symbolized love, happiness, holiness and fruitfulness.
sentences.cn: 长久以来,人们一直认为柑橘果象征着爱 、 幸福 、 神圣和富足.

words.tran_cn: 富有成效的；多产的；果实结得多的
不成功的，徒劳的；不结果实的
圆润的；有果味的；果实状的
果实；结果实；[食品] 水果；成果
